item.title: Microsoft-backed Mistral launches European AI cloud to compete with AWS and Azure
item.description: Mistral AI partners with Nvidia to launch European AI infrastructure platform, challenging US cloud giants while unveiling breakthrough reasoning mode...

item.title: Databricks open-sources declarative ETL framework powering 90% faster pipeline builds
item.description: With Apache Spark Declarative Pipelines, engineers describe what their pipeline should do using SQL or Python, and Apache Spark handles the execution.

item.title: ‘Generative AI helps us bend time’: CrowdStrike, Nvidia embed real-time LLM defense, changing how enterprises secure AI
item.description: Falcon is now built into Nvidia’s LLMs, delivering native runtime threat defense and eliminating blind spots across AI pipelines.

item.title: Why most enterprise AI agents never reach production and how Databricks plans to fix it
item.description: Databricks Agent Bricks automates enterprise AI agent optimization and evaluation, eliminating manual processes that block production deployments.

item.title: Outset raises $17M to replace human interviewers with AI agents for enterprise research
item.description: Outset raises $17M Series A to scale its AI-moderated research platform used by Nestlé, Microsoft, and WeightWatchers that's 8x faster and 81% cheaper...
